title: Second Order {W}ino{B}ias ({S}o{W}ino{B}ias) Test Set for Latent Gender Bias Detection in Coreference Resolution
venue: Proceedings of the 3rd Workshop on Gender Bias in Natural Language Processing
abstract: We observe an instance of gender-induced bias in a downstream application, despite the absence of explicit gender words in the test cases. We provide a test set, SoWinoBias, for the purpose of measuring such latent gender bias in coreference resolution systems. We evaluate the performance of current debiasing methods on the SoWinoBias test set, especially in reference to the methodâ€™s design and altered embedding space properties.
